page.title: 07BUS SERVICES - ELLOUGHTON
page.content: East Yorkshire, a National Bus Company, has a garage at Elloughton, at which 13 diesel operated buses and 16 drivers are based. The weekly total of buses leaving Elloughton is: to Hull 119, York 7, Goole 64. Five National Express journeys going to and from Hull pass through Elloughton, providing the area with a direct link to and from London, Manchester and Liverpool, and an indirect service to every major town and city in Britain. There is an extensive programme of excursions throughout the year, many of which pick up passengers at Elloughton, as do many of the holiday and mini_break coaches. Passengers for National Express, excursion and holiday services are provided with timetables, publicity and booking facilities by the agent at the local newspaper shop _ Elloughton News.
